ariel.kavoussi: I like phone banking! I will go with you . A good tip is to start the conversation with an apology for bothering them because they are getting a lot of calls right now. Also to not ask “is joe home?” Just go straight into “hello joe my name is Ariel and I’m a volunteer for bernie sanders, can we count on your support”? Then you do the survey questions then at the end ask them what issues they care about and then you can share your personal story at the end and have a good conversation. Also always stay positive and do not argue with anyone just ask questions and say the good things about bernie sanders
